After trying several print shops around the Birmingham area, I was beginning to get discouraged by the lack of good customer service and adherence to preferences and deadlines. I stopped by After Hours one day as a last resort. And I couldn't have been more pleased!
Mr Smith answered all of my questions, offered his opinion and advice when I wasn't sure about something, communicated with me throughout the entire process, and got my order to me right on time! He even allowed me to look over a sample proof before he printed my order. The shirts look amazing - better then I had hoped. Will definitely be using After Hours for all of my future screen printing projects.

name: Jordan Lovell
text:
Really disappointed in Athens Athletics this year.  They shorted me one Jersey and two hats for youth baseball.  They told me the items would here by opening day.  Long story short, they weren't.  Nobody called, nobody apologized, no explanations were given....  I was told they had ordered me a shirt, but they no longer had the size I needed, so they ordered a different size.  Also, eventually, they told me the hats had never been ordered.

I came today and they refunded me my money that I paid them 2-3 weeks ago.  I still don't have the hats and shirts for everyone :(

resp.text: I apologize that you were not called or apologized too. These hats and jerseys are trademarked and we can’t produce them ourselves because of MLB. When the company is out of stock and tells me they can’t give me a date of when they will be there I chose to get the next size so you would have something for opening day. The hats were ordered originally and shorted from the order so they were reordered. It is not our intention at all for you not to get what you order. If I could print them myself this would not be an issue. Again I apologize for this happening!

name: William Bradford
text: I specifically requested 8 separate 3.5" inch strips of vinyl cut, this way they could be applied as striped. Instead I recieved 8 strips on two sheets making it impossible to peel off one at a time let alone use it for my intended application. They were also 3.75" in width. When confronted with these concerns the only thing they could say was and I quote, "Well you've already paid for them." I refuse to do any more business with them...the lack of professionalism, and poor listening skills and the carelessness have left a foul taste in my mouth. So much for trying to support small hometown businesses.

resp.text:
Hey William,
We are out of town but I would like to talk to you about your experience. I am sorry and I think it was a big misunderstanding and would like to make this right. Our sales person thought the extra size was a bonus on your end. You have been a great customer and we don't want to lose your business. You have always been so fun to work with and I will correct this at no charge on Monday when we return from our business trip.

name: Brandy Contorno
text: Work was not performed as requested. Requested embroidered personalization on my unborn son's hospital outfits & diaper bag. Vinyl was applied instead of embroidery & totally ruined all 4 items. Fonts, colors, & sizing of personalization were also all wrong. Owner & employee were EXTREMELY rude about the entire situation & not once even offered a simple apology & refused to make this order right. When we refused to pay for the work performed since it wasn't what we requested, we were told that we would not be given our merchandise back that was purchased elsewhere until we paid. Had to repurchase all 4 items & take them to a different shop to have personalization done, costing us over $100 for a mistake that was not our fault. Will make sure EVERYONE knows the HORRIBLE work & customer service we received from this establishment.

resp.text: We are sorry for your issue. We worked with your mother on making these items and we were told to make them out of heat press. She chose the colors out of the heat press sample book for your items. She asked for the cheapest way to monogram where we told her…heat press. I agree embroidery looks better on a diaper bag but we make what the client orders. Your mother was happy with what we did when picking up the order but changed her mind after being verbally berated by you over the phone that it was not what you wanted.. We apologized the day the order was received several times. We apologized to you over the phone even thought we never spoke to you before hand. We made exactly what your mother ordered so yes we made her pay for it. I am going to say the moral of the story is if you want it done a certain way please order it yourself.

The only reason I give 5 stars is only because of one person and only one person, Penny. They built a sign for my gas station and it was something wrong with it. I contacted Steve and he promised to fix the problem. after couple of weeks he even did not pick up his phone and he never returned our call back. I contacted the store and spoke to Penny on the phone. she fixed our problem as fast as she could. she kept me as a customer and only because of her, I might go back there. It is so disrespectful when you do not pick up your phone on a customer who tipped you $100.00 for another job couple of months ago Steve. you should learn the customer service from Penny, how to do your job, keep your customers in this market and making sure they are happy.
Thank you Penny...
(update in response to Dear Steve)
I wish you guys the best in your business as well, also in case nobody get it in a wrong way, my project didn't assigned to another team by you, My project got ignored by you for 2 weeks same as my 4 phone calls and voicemails, So I decided to call the shop instead of your cellphone to resolve the issue and thanks god Penny fixed my problem.
Thank you

resp.text: Your "design" was some scribble on a piece of paper.  Even so, You were not charged any art or design fees.... so we don't understand what your actual issue was.  Instant signs Strives to make every customer happy.  Thank you

text: Our job was put off and apparently not a priority. We had to make a number of calls to get installation. As to date, job still not complete. I am giving 3 stars only because in the past we were given excellent service.

resp.text: Sorry there may have been a delay with your order.  More details would have been appreciated.

text: They did an amazing job with the business signs we ordered. They also do vehicle wraps and banners as well. They're the only place I'll go in Mobile for printing. A+++

resp.text: Thanks for the fine review!

text: Great customer service and timely turnaround to get jobs done. I have used a few other sign companies in town and they are not as professional. I will only use Instant Sign Center for my company signs.

resp.text: Great review!  Thanks for your business!

name: The Hair Co. Salon
text: We ordered some yard signs from here for our salon. Beautiful coloring, they were so bright and have done great at catching passerby's attention and bringing in more clientele. They were done super quick and the Sign Source team communicated with us through the whole process. We really enjoyed working with them, definitely going back for all of our future signage needs.

name: Fonseca Photography
text: Ordered business cards from here and they looked great! Turnaround was quick and they have a top notch designer. Everyone I met was friendly and quick to help me with my order. They updated me promptly when my order was ready to pick up. My wife, who crafts candles for The Candle Co., used Sign Source for her labels and they looked great. They were able to print and cut 800 decals and have them ready for pickup the same day.

name: The Candle Co.
text: Absolutely love this shop! They print the labels for my candle company and are incredibly efficient and professional. I was able to get 800 labels printed, cut, and ready for pickup within 1 day of me ordering. 11/10 would recommend!

name: S&S Hauling
text: Recently ordered some vinyl decals for my work vehicles from here. Quick turnaround time, they were ready within a day of me placing my order. They look great and are exactly what I wanted. Excellent communication and friendly service.

name: Jacoby Frazier
text: Had an order of shirts and didn’t match my logo at all. When they tried to correct it they just put another logo on top of the previous. I tried to do business with them again and I haven’t had a response to my email in almost three weeks.

resp.text: Your only order for six polo shirts in August, 2020 used a printed transfer red which which we changed per your request to a darker red at no charge.  When you initiated email communication April 28th, 2021 on placing a new order, you and the designer had a lengthy two day exchange of emails with descriptions, options, and pricing...even photos from the designer of the different shirts.  Your last email to us said "looks great, do you have a solid black?" to which we responded "yes, the Hanes and C2 both have a solid black. It did not show well in the photos. Sorry I meant to say that in the first email"  We have not heard from you since. We assumed you had changed your mind or made other plans as the two day email exchange involved some 8 messages between you and the designer.  We apologize for not following up with you to see if you got the last of four emails from the designer.  We will offer you a 20% discount on this order of 12 screen printed polo shirts to assure you we can and will meet our customer's  screen printed apparel needs. We very much wanted your business then and still do!

resp.text: Thank you Alyson.  I has been a pleasure to work with you!

text: I spoke to Gary on the phone seemed pleasant gave me his email address. I emailed him what I needed done on 12.6.18. Never received a response. I emailed him again asking for an update 1.3.19. I asked when can they have it done , he responded sometime in March because they are very busy doing orders for Wal-Mart

name: Ryland Spitzer
text: Very poor communication. They told us we needed a minimum order of 36 t shirts, we had over 60 shirts. Gary would not respond to us and then told us that the turn around time we wanted was not reasonable. However I believe 3 months is more than reasonable. Gary was very rude to us and told us that our order was not worth their time. I do not recommend Inkworks and if you do decide to do business with them I would Highly not recommend Gary.

name: David Solomon
text: Stay far away from this company.  Gary is not to be trusted.

text: Definitely number 1 if you need screen printed or embroidered shirts. Family run business and highly recommended

name: Farra SG
text: An online company misplaced our order and didn't inform us until the evening before  our event. Inkworks moved mountains and printed shirts for us in one day and they were perfect!

name: Jessica H
text: This company has poor communication and says one thing on the phone and another in an email. They messed up our order as well and caused it to be even further delayed. I used based off the fact they are a provider for someone I know and did not use either of my friends in the business, however this was a big mistake. On the phone we discussed Gilden and in an email I was quoted some poor quality shirts as a price match. I am sorry, but a shirt of poorer quality is not an equal match. I hope the people who get these shirts don't fuss too much because I am not happy I even have to give them to them. They represent my group poorly and I will not do business with them again. They did apologize, but that was a little too late and not enough especially considering I still have no shirts, but they have managed to get other shirts to our school.  If you have a contract with a school you should keep their colors in stock, however they must not because I kept being told they had to order. Ridiculous...

name: Glynn Dykes
text: Great service, good product. Better location than the previous downtown location.

name: Nicole M. Zaffiris
text: This company is terrible. Sent them an order for a large client. They printed the wrong blue in spite of being clearly stated on the purchase order in two places and then would not return calls or emails. Customer received the shirts and informed us that the 2XL's were completely missing.  After repeated phone calls and unanswered emails we replaced the shirts at our expense. They have had those shirts for two months now and when push came to shove today after asking when the shirts would be printed we were first told by Teresa that their machine broke down and they needed to send out for parts. When I asked them if all five machine broke down at the same time I then received a call back from Carol who said she was the owner and I was told they would not be printing the shirts because they were less than their minimum. Minimum?  I guess that they have no problem with not correcting their mistake. Coincidently I have a copy of there price list and on it states 1 is the minimum so not sure why 22 shirts is less than minimum. I have been in business for 32 years and I value a good vendor that stands behind their work. This is definitely not the case with InkWorks.

text: We have used Mammoth many times for booster club t-shirts and fundraisers.  They have awesome creative ideas for designs--you can go in with just a general idea of what you want and they take it and run with it.  They are also have great turnaround time.  They are also generous and give back to their local community-we are lucky to have them here.

name: Erin Peacock
text:
Perfect Printing and Great Design Work
We had t-shirts printed for the cast and crew of a theatrical production.  The design was the same on each shirt but Mammoth allowed us to let each person select his or her own color from a t-shirt line.  There were about 25 shirts of all colors and every one was perfect!  Thank you Mammoth!

name: Megan Benson
text: Mammoth designed our logo based off a vague description of what I wanted. They did an amazing job. Also, they have made logo shirts and sweatshirts for us on multiple occasions! Each time the order was completed quickly and the products have been the best of quality. We are still wearing shirts made nearly 3 years ago and the print looks new.

name: Kartik Goyal
text:
I went there hoping to JUST burn a design on a screen (not print), and without looking over the design, the guy said "they have other jobs to attend to". I understand if they have a busy schedule, but it wouldn't hurt to do some project which would only take 1 hour max.

— Well, the very first question I asked when I entered your place was, if you guys make the screen if I provide you the design, the answer was yes. That’s why I proceeded for more details. Otherwise I would’ve left right away if I was told no. And yes, you did recommend other place, but that doesn’t justify in you saying that you have other jobs to attend to.

resp.text:
I am sorry you are upset.  There was no need to look over the design because we do not offer that service.  Quoting you were just told we "have other jobs to attend to" makes it appear we were too busy to acknowledge you. We even suggested you try other screen printing places and recommended STAMP in downtown Auburn.  If you ever need any services we actually provide just shoot us an email at info@mammothprintshop.com and we will be more than happy to work with you.
Again, I am sorry you are disappointed that we were unable to help you because it's not a service we provide.
-Sophia Graham   owner

Over the years we have tried large companies who have made promises they can’t keep and smaller companies who don’t have the variety of merchandise that we like. With most of our firefighters being veterans I can say Mammoth truly supports veterans and helps them look good while they continue to make the sacrifice for others.

resp.text:
*** Mr Lancaster I have attempted to reply to you for almost 2 months. Again after researching I can find no record of having done work for you or even  having received correspondence.  I have contacted Google about removing your review.

(Original first owner reply)
I am very sorry you had a negative experience. Could you please tell me more about it so I can look into it further?
(Second owner reply)
I am sorry you feel you have had a bad experience with us, but I have waited 2 weeks and searched and we have no log of you having placed an order, or that you have even come in or called us. I am not sure of what your experience was, but we take pride in being the best at what we do

name: Willis Boyett
text: TERRIBLE!! Service was terrible! They messed our order then told me to go to another company to get what we needed and they would give a refund. So when I go back to get refund they will only refund half of what product cost at other business. So not only did it cost me twice as much I had to go and get the stuff. I completely understand making a mistake but refusing to make it rite is a pathetic excuse for a business. We will NEVER use this business again! HORRIBLE!

resp.text: I'm sorry for the miscommunication.  Please email me at matthew@flintcrossing.com and I will make sure you are refunded the correct amount.

name: Billy Coogan
text:
I own a local business and the folks at Visual Effects & Vinyl Solutions are a blessing to have so close to us to do business with.

They do our t-shirts, polos, business cards, vehicle wraps and decals, vinyl banners and we are always happy with the product and ordering processes. A++++

name: Aricka Brazer
text:
Placed a simple order for vinyl stickers with them and they asked me to come back in 2 days. I can buy a product that is five times larger with my manufacturer for the same price This guy was going to charge me for this smaller order.

I came back 3 days later and they couldn't find my order. They called the vinyl person and he didn't answer so she told  me to come back later...not a time. Just later. I left a note with what I was there for and what I needed. Came back 2 hours later and Found out the guy had come back and left again and he did not make them. When the service girl called again he barked he at her to tell me to come back at 4. I don't think so. I left and said don't worry about it.

Bottom line. Wouldn't go back. Wouldn't recommend them. Not good customer service. If he didn't want to do my order he shouldn't have wasted my time.
